title: Wild Irish Christmas
description: Blush sensuality This is a sensual romance (may have explicit love scenes, but not erotic in frequency or type)Wild Irish, Book Eight“To Conall Brannagh.”Ewan took the bottle from his father. “Who?”“Conall Brannagh,” Patrick repeated. “If your mother had chosen him over me, none of us would be here tonight.”It’s Christmas Eve, and the Collins siblings have given their father a precious gift. All seven have gathered together to spend the night in his apartment above the family pub, the warm, loving home where Patrick and Sunday raised their large brood.You’ve witnessed each child find their happy-ever-after. Now gather ’round the tree and join the Collins family as they pass a bottle of Jameson, and Patrick shares the story of how he won the heart of Sunday, his true love, his soul mate…and the mother of his seven Wild Irish.
author: Mari Carr
